page.title: 10FARMING
page.content: In the Eastnor Area there are{eight {arable farms.}They all grow corn and mowing grass and some grow potatoes. They grow the following varieties of corn :- oats, wheat and barley. They also grow the following varieties of potatoes :- wilja, pentland hawk and desiree. The farms cut their own grass and corn,some of this is fed to cows and sheep and some is sold. Two of the eight farms are rented the rest are still farmed by the Estate. Some of the farms have new machinery but most of it is a few years old. The new machinery consists mostly of combines or corn hauling trailers, new tractors and ploughs.
